description: Ian Williams of NBC looks inside the notorious camps where American journalists Laura Ling and Euna Lee were sentenced to 12 years of hard labor.
title: Inside North Korea's Labor Camps
title_page: Inside North Korea's Labor Camps - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Ian Williams of NBC looks inside the notorious camps where American journalists Laura Ling and Euna Lee were sentenced to 12 years of hard labor.
